metadata.title: CVE-2022-28286 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Due to a layout change, iframe contents could have been rendered outside ofits border. This could have led to user confusion or spoofing attacks. Thisvulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.8, Firefox < 99, and Firefox ESR <91.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
